doc:
Abe Simon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abe_Simon 0 Abraham Simon (May 30, 1913 – October 24, 1969) was an American professional heavyweight boxer. He fought Joe Louis for the World Heavyweight title twice. After retiring he became an actor and appeared in films such as On the Waterfront, Never Love a Stranger and Requiem for a Heavyweight, and a number of live dramas during the early days of television. Abraham_Simon ( May_30_,_1913 – October_24_,_1969 ) was an_American_professional_heavyweight_boxer . He fought Joe_Louis for the_World_Heavyweight_title twice . After retiring he became an_actor and appeared in films such_as On the_Waterfront , Never_Love a_Stranger and Requiem for a_Heavyweight , and a_number of live_dramas during the_early_days of television .
